body:
Comment 2 by **serge.hulne**: 
Thanks !, you are right:
(I got mixed up between the settings of my Linux installation and the ones of my Mac
installation)

I think, I have set my Linux settings right now:

serge2@shuttle:~/temp$ echo $GOBIN
/home/serge2/bin
serge2@shuttle:~/temp$ env PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/bin:${GOBIN:-$HOME/bin} sh
-c "/bin/ls -l $(which 8g)"
-rwxr-xr-x 1 serge2 serge2 934581 2010-03-10 10:33 /home/serge2/bin/8g
serge2@shuttle:~/temp$

(My Linux machine is older that my Mac , I use 8g)

Thanks again,
Serge Hulne.
